question: How has CEO Dr. Maya Chen's background influenced the company's strategic direction?
response: {"type":"result","subtype":"success","is_error":false,"duration_ms":28553,"duration_api_ms":26071,"num_turns":7,"result":"I'll use the available context from the annual report and other documents:\n\n{\"answer\": \"Dr. Maya Chen, with a background in Cognitive Neuroscience and having previously worked at NeuroSync Labs, has strategically guided Soong-Daystrom towards advanced neural interface technologies and AI research. expected_answer: Her background as CTO of NeuroSync Labs (neural interface company) led to the 2120 acquisition, expansion into neural interfaces (NIM product line), and focus on consciousness research (Project Prometheus). This shifted the company from pure robotics to human-AI integration
